374958318.name: graftor.szm C2 traffic
374958318.description: This signature detects Wgeneric Command and Control Traffic. Command and Control traffic indicates the presence of potentially infected systems and should be investigated as soon as possible.

59220.name: SSL Weak Cipher Suite Selection Vulnerability
59220.description: SSL is prone to spoofing vulnerability while using DES/3DES encryption algorithms. The vulnerability is due to the lack of proper checks on encryption method in SSL Server Hello responses, leading to an exploitable man-in-the-middle. An attacker could exploit the vulnerability by intercepting packets. A successful attack could lead to man-in-the-middle attack.
